description: As well as a night-time curfew, travel between regions can be banned under the emergency measures.
title: Covid: Spain imposes national night-time curfew to curb infections
title_page: Covid: Spain imposes national night-time curfew to curb infections - BBC News
maintext: "We think that we will suffer a bit this month but by gritting our teeth with these restrictions, we'll be able to breathe again in December," Mr Conte told a news conference on Sunday.
